1: Reduced the size of the vector from 1,000,000 to 10,000 to minimize memory usage and operations.
2: Changed the method of checking for previously seen numbers by storing the current number in the vector and comparing it to previous numbers instead of using counters.
3: Changed the maximum number of iterations from 1,000,000 to 10,000, reducing the number of operations.
4: Simplified the calculation of the next number to a single line of code instead of using an if-else statement.
